channel.title: constant on Fresh Swift
channel.description: Recent content in constant on Fresh Swift

item.title: Reminder About Let Initialization
item.description: Use Your Loaf with a quick reminder about declaring let constants in functions. With Swift being in a constant state of evolution, sometimes it helps to be reminded about some of the less talked about language features. I must admit that I did forget about this one, and probable declared a few variables where I could have declared constants.
